en: The ship will cross the equator tonight.

en: Washing is my work.

en: Even if you wash it, the color won't come out.

en: It needs washing.

en: Go and help wash up, will you?

en: There are many foreign tourists in Asakusa.

en: Mt. Asama is not as high as Mt. Fuji.

en: Mt. Asama is now dormant.

en: I may not have much to offer in the way of learning or ability, but I want to do whatever I can for us all and humbly ask for your favor.
zh: 虽然我才疏学浅，但我愿意为大家尽绵薄之力，还请多多关照。

en: The fountain sends hot water to a height of 170 feet.

en: I want the fan.

en: I want an electric fan.

en: I want a fan.

en: Peace-keeping troops moved in to restore calm after the battle.

en: We had terrible times during the war.

en: Prices were strictly regulated during the war.

en: War necessarily causes unhappiness.

en: War is not inevitable.

en: The war is not inevitable.

en: They were unanimous that the war should be brought to a halt.

en: War is a crime against humanity.

en: War causes terrible miseries.

en: War concerns us all.

en: We must avoid war by all possible means.

en: War results only in senseless and violent destruction.

en: The war is still going on.

en: The war lasted nearly ten years.

en: War must be avoided at all costs.

en: The war made the country poor.

en: The war brought ruin to the country.

en: The war brought about death and destruction in the city.

en: The war ended in 1945.

en: War broke out in 1939.

en: The war broke out in 1939.

en: Their plans blew up when the war broke out.

en: It is our ardent hope that the war will end soon.

en: Bonds were issued to finance a war.

en: The day will come when there will be no war.

en: The time may come when we will have no war.

en: The accompaniments of the war are misery and sorrow.

en: When it comes to war, they are as brave as anyone.

en: There is a threat of war.

en: War compelled soldiers to go to the front.

en: The war brought their research to an end.

en: I feel sad when I think about all the people who die in wars.

en: The war wasted the country.

en: Make love, not war.

en: How old were you when the war broke out?

en: War suddenly broke out.

en: The year the war ended, I was born.
zh: 战争结束那年我出生了。

en: I was born the year the war ended.

en: It was after four years that the war came to an end.

en: She had to part with her family when the war began.
zh: 战争开始时，她不得不和家人分开。

en: We had lived there for ten years when the war broke out.
zh: 战争爆发时，我们已经在那里住了十年了。

en: War bankrupted the nation's resources and manpower.
zh: 战争耗尽了国家的资源和人力。

en: It is hoped that the war will end before long.
zh: 希望战争很快就能结束。

en: There's a possibility of war.

en: May there be no war!

en: I hope war doesn't break out.

en: He was living in London when the war broke out.
zh: 战争爆发时他正住在伦敦。

en: I hope the time will soon come when there would be no more war.

en: The war diminished the wealth of the country.

en: There is no telling when the war will end.

en: I went to Europe before the war.

en: The battlefield was full of the dead and the dying.

en: Why don't you try a different tack?

en: The government rationed meat during the war.

en: During the war, we often had to make do without sugar.

en: During the war, he served in the army.

en: Happening in wartime, this would amount to disaster.
zh: 这要是发生在战时，那简直就是灾难。

en: After the war, the idea of democracy spread throughout Japan.

en: A great change has come about after the war.

zh: 战后经历了几段长期的持续繁荣，比如神武景气和岩户景气。

en: The war situation was desperate.

en: The war is going in our favor.

en: The battle is not always to the strong.

en: The war went against the country.

en: We will win the day.

en: Battle's never proven peace.

en: The river suddenly narrows at this point.

en: There is a beautiful walk along the river.

en: I attempted to swim across the river.

en: They were out of breath after swimming across the river.
zh: 他们游过河后都累得气喘吁吁的。

en: It is very important for us to love a river.

en: May I go to the river?

en: The river is deep here.

en: The river is widest at this point.

en: There's a lot of trash on the far bank of the river.

en: The place where a river starts is its source.

en: Swim across to the other side of the river.

en: We set up the tent next to the river.

en: We pitched the tent next to the river.

en: The river was shallow at that point.

en: The water is deep in this part of the river.

en: As he was about to fall into the river, he took hold of the tree.
zh: 就在他快要掉进河里的时候，他抓住了那棵树。

en: I walked along the river.

en: Bear south until you reach the river.
zh: 一直往南走就到河边了。

en: Don't throw a stone into the river.
zh: 别往河里扔石头。

en: Don't throw rocks into the river.
zh: 别往河里扔石块。

en: Let's go and swim in the river.
zh: 咱们去河里游泳吧。

en: They're constructing a bridge over the river.

en: Walk along the river and you will find the school.

en: There was no water in the river.

en: A mist hung over the river.

en: There is a village between the river and the hill.

en: Did you catch any fish in the river?

en: Who is the boy swimming in the river?

en: Some children are swimming in the river.

en: The man swimming in the river is my friend.

en: The river flooded a large area.

en: It's really fast with a dedicated line.

en: You can say that the circumstances were thus in the period leading up to the declaration of war.
zh: 可以说，在宣战前的这段时间，情况就是这样的。

en: A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step.

en: Kanako commutes from Chiba to Tokyo.

en: Chiyonofuji carried all before him.

en: Cut into long thin strips.

en: As many as a thousand people were there.

en: There were toward a thousand people.

en: There were about a thousand people.

en: Can you break a 1000 yen bill?

en: If you add one hundred to one thousand, you get eleven hundred.

en: The other day I discovered a book written by my father.

en: Her teacher praised her.

en: The teacher gave her much information about the university.
zh: 老师给了她很多关于那所大学的信息。

en: The teacher gave her a lot of information about the university.
zh: 老师向她提供了不少关于那所大学的情况。

en: The teacher blamed her for the mistake.

zh: 老师让他放学后留下来。

en: A teacher was advised to him.
zh: 有人给他推荐了一位老师。

en: The teacher allowed him to go home.
zh: 老师准许他回家了。

en: The teacher told him to study English hard.
zh: 老师让他好好学英语。

en: The teacher told him to rewrite his essay.
zh: 老师让他重写作文。

en: The teacher permitted him to go home.
zh: 老师准他回家了。

en: His teacher gave it to him straight for breaking the chair.

en: Our teacher warned him not to be late again.

en: The teacher particularly emphasized that point.

en: The teacher is busy looking over the examination papers.

en: The teacher is busy marking papers.

en: Our teacher seemed angry.

en: He gently took the paper out of her hands and said, "It's time to rest."
zh: 他轻轻地从她手里拿走那张纸，说：“该休息了。”

en: The teacher said that the earth is round.

zh: 老师说二战是1939年爆发的。

en: Teachers should deal fairly with their students.

en: The teacher suggested that we go to the library to study.

en: Our teacher likes his new car.

en: The teacher explained the new lesson at length to the students.

en: The teacher let the boy go home.

en: The teacher called the roll in class.

en: Our teacher called the roll at the beginning of the class.

en: Our teacher dwelt on the importance of punctuality.

en: The teacher pointed her finger at me and asked me to go with her.

en: The teacher encouraged me to study abroad.

en: The teacher told us to be quiet.

en: The teacher admonished us that we should be silent.

en: The teacher gave us homework.

en: Our teacher told us that we should do our best.

en: The teacher didn't permit me to leave early.

en: The teacher allowed me to leave school early.

en: The teacher corrected the composition that I had prepared.

en: The teacher tried to accustom the children to school.

en: Our teacher seemed surprised.

zh: 老师可能什么都不说，而是根据学生的参与度、发言内容以及领导能力来打分。

en: The teacher got well again.

en: The teacher praised the boy for his honesty.

en: The teacher interpreted the passage of the poem.

en: What the teacher said encouraged Mary to study harder.
zh: 老师的话鼓励了玛丽更加努力学习。

en: According to our teacher, she entered the hospital.

en: The teacher's name was Mr Grey.

en: Attend to what your teacher says.

en: I don't understand what the teacher said.

en: You must pay attention to what your teacher says.

en: You must heed the advice of your teacher.

en: Let's ask the teacher.

en: I couldn't care less if the teacher is mad at me.

en: I gave an answer that was way out in left field when the teacher caught me off-guard and called on me.

zh: 老师突然点我名，我一慌，说话就结结巴巴的。

en: After I had handed in my report to the teacher, I had to start writing another.

en: Please remember me to your teacher.

en: I will tell the teacher all about it.

en: There are teachers and teachers.

en: Now I am a teacher, I think otherwise.

en: To the professor, she was a joy to teach.

en: As far as the teacher was concerned, she was a joy to teach.
zh: 在老师看来，教她是一件很快乐的事。

en: For the teacher, teaching her was fun.

en: Did you inform your teacher of this?

en: Tell the teacher your name.

en: After I talked with my teacher, I decided to work hard.

en: Can I speak to the doctor?

en: May I speak to the professor?

en: The teacher and I sat face to face.

en: There are teachers and then there are teachers.

en: Even the teacher could not solve the problem.

en: Even a teacher can make mistakes.

en: The teachers assembled their classes in the gymnasium.

en: The teachers were divided on the issue.
zh: 老师们在这个问题上意见不一。

en: There comes our teacher.

en: There comes our teacher. He is walking very slowly.
zh: 咱们老师来了，他走得很慢。

en: Hardly had the teacher entered the room when we stopped chatting.
zh: 老师一进屋，我们就不聊天了。

en: She stood up when her teacher came in.

en: Our teacher had hardly finished the class when the bell rang.

en: My teacher put in a good word for me.
zh: 老师帮我说了不少好话。

en: While the teacher was teaching, the students slept.
zh: 老师讲课的时候，学生们在睡觉。

en: The teacher is coming along.
zh: 老师走过来了。

en: Not all teachers behave like that.
zh: 也不是所有老师都那样的。

en: The teacher had a bad cold.
zh: 老师得了重感冒。

en: The teacher cannot have said such a thing.
zh: 老师不可能说过这种话。

en: The teacher can't have said such a thing.
zh: 老师肯定没说过那种话。

en: The teacher interpreted the sentence for us.
zh: 老师给我们讲解了这个句子。

en: The teacher will illustrate how to do it.
zh: 老师会演示一下怎么做。

en: I recognized the teacher at once, because I had met him before.
zh: 我一眼就认出了那位老师，因为我以前见过他。

en: Here comes our teacher.
zh: 咱们老师过来了。

en: Rabbi, we know you are a teacher who has come from God.
zh: 拉比，我们知道您是神差来的老师。

en: Professor, what do you think of the situation in the Middle East?
zh: 教授，您对中东局势怎么看？

en: Do I have to bring my son to your office, Doctor?
zh: 医生，我得带我儿子去您的诊所吗？

en: Doctor, cure me.
zh: 医生，治好我吧。

en: I have a stomachache, doctor.
zh: 医生，我胃疼。

en: I won't ever talk in class again.
zh: 我以后上课再也不说话了。

en: Rabbi, that man who was with you on the other side of the Jordan - the one you testified about - well, he is baptizing, and everyone is going to him.
zh: 拉比，以前在约旦河那边跟您在一起、您为他作证的那个人，现在他在给人施洗，大家都找他去了。

en: Sir, do we have to write in ink?
zh: 老师，我们必须用钢笔写吗？

en: Thank you very much, doctor.
zh: 医生，太谢谢您了。

en: Doctor, please give this child first aid.
zh: 医生，请给这孩子做下急救。

en: Thank you, Doctor.
zh: 谢谢医生。

en: Rabbi, you are the Son of God; you are the King of Israel.
zh: 拉比，您是神的儿子，您是以色列的王。

en: The first blow is half the battle.
zh: 良好的开端是成功的一半。

en: While the birth rate is intended to be decreased in developing countries, that of developed nations is selfishly planned to be increased, resulting in the difficulty of getting mutual consent.
zh: 虽说发展中国家要降低出生率，发达国家却自私地计划提高出生率，这导致双方很难达成共识。

en: Advanced countries must give aid to developing countries.
zh: 发达国家必须援助发展中国家。

en: The countries should aid the countries much more.
zh: 这些国家应该多多援助那些国家。

en: The leaders of seven industrial democracies will meet in Okinawa in 2000.
zh: 七个工业化民主国家的领导人将于2000年在冲绳会晤。

en: I had to write a paper on the Space Age last weekend.
zh: 上周末我得写一篇关于太空时代的论文。

en: Last week, I mailed him some souvenirs from the U.S.
zh: 上周我从美国给他寄了一些纪念品。

en: He was sick last week.
zh: 他上周病了。

en: He won the prize last week.
zh: 他上周获奖了。

en: I still owe my brother the ten dollars that he lent me last week.
zh: 我还欠我哥上周借给我的那十块钱。

en: We took an examination in math last week.
zh: 我们上周考了数学。

en: I met his sister last week.
zh: 我上周见到了他姐姐。

en: I went to see his older sister last week.
zh: 我上周去看他姐姐了。

en: I went to see his sister last week.
zh: 我上周去看他妹妹了。

en: I had him paint the gate last week.
zh: 上周我让他把大门给刷了。

en: The eel I caught last week is still alive.
zh: 我上周抓的那条鳗鱼还活着呢。

en: We visited the museum last week.
zh: 我们上周去参观了博物馆。

en: Let's resume reading where we left off last week.
zh: 咱们从上礼拜停下的地方接着读吧。

en: Last week five students were absent from class.
zh: 上周有五个学生没来上课。

en: I met Meg in Kyoto last week.
zh: 我上礼拜在京都遇见了Meg。

en: Who was absent from school last week?
zh: 上周谁没来上学？

en: I took a day off last week.
zh: 我上礼拜请了一天假。

en: Up to last week, I hadn't received a reply.
zh: 直到上个礼拜，我还没收到回信。

en: Last week I gained another five pounds.
zh: 我上周又重了五磅。

en: I was very busy last week.
zh: 我上礼拜特别忙。

en: I ran into Mary at a party last week.
zh: 我上周在派对上碰到Mary了。

en: It has been raining since last Thursday.
zh: 从上周四起就一直下雨。

en: What did you do last Sunday?
zh: 你上周日干什么了？

en: My family went to the zoo to see pandas last Sunday.
zh: 我们全家上周日去动物园看大熊猫了。

en: We saw a funny movie last Sunday.
zh: 我们上周日看了一部挺逗的电影。

en: I remembered riding home in a pickup truck last Sunday.
zh: 我想起来上周日我是坐皮卡回家的。

en: It has been raining since last Sunday.
zh: 从上周日开始就一直在下雨。

en: When I met Hanako last Sunday, she said she had returned three days before.
zh: 我上周日见到花子的时候，她说她三天前就回来了。

en: I went shopping last Saturday.
zh: 我上周六去逛街了。

en: It has been raining since last Saturday.
zh: 从上个周六起就一直下雨。

en: Were you at the theater last Saturday?
zh: 你上周六在剧院吗？

en: Not a few students came to the concert last Saturday.
zh: 上周六不少学生都去听音乐会了。

en: I saw an exciting baseball game last Saturday.
zh: 我上周六看了一场特别精彩的棒球赛。

en: I visited him this day last week.
zh: 我上礼拜的今天去看了他。

en: I visited him a week ago today.
zh: 我一周前的今天去拜访了他。

en: It has been raining since last Monday.
zh: 从上周一就开始一直下雨。

en: We had flooding because of last week's heavy rains.
zh: 因为上周的大雨，我们这儿闹水灾了。

en: We had the meeting in this room last Friday.
zh: 我们上周五是在这间屋子开的会。

en: It has been fine since last Friday.
zh: 从上周五开始天气一直挺好的。

en: Last week's meeting was the longest we have had this year.
zh: 上周的会是今年开得最久的一次。

en: On last week's English test, my score was worse than hers.
zh: 上周的英语考试，我考得比她还差。

en: Do you know how many people turned up at the dance last week?
zh: 你知道上周舞会有多少人参加吗？

en: There were some three thousand people who took part in the strike last week.
zh: 上周大概有三千人参加了罢工。

en: Last week the powerful Keidanren called on Tokyo to lift the ban.
zh: 上周，实力雄厚的经团联呼吁东京解除禁令。

en: It was last week.
zh: 那是上周的事。

en: Father complains of having been busy since last week.
zh: 我爸总抱怨说他从上周起就一直很忙。

en: My dad is complaining; he's been constantly busy since last week.
zh: 我爸一直在抱怨，说他从上周开始就没停过，一直特别忙。

en: There's been a constant stream of complaint calls since last week.
zh: 从上周开始，投诉电话就没断过。

en: I wrote to Mr Wood last week and asked him to give you a job on the farm.
zh: 我上周给伍德先生写了信，让他给你在农场安排个活儿。

en: I wrote to Mr. Wood last week and asked him to give you a job on the farm.
zh: 我上周给伍德先生写了信，让他给你在农场安排个活儿。

en: I am glad to have helped you last week.
zh: 很高兴上周能帮到你。

en: I'm glad I was able to help you last week.
zh: 很高兴上周帮上了你的忙。

en: The promise I made to you last week still holds true.
zh: 我上周对你的承诺现在还是算数的。

en: Have you finished reading the book I lent you last week?
zh: 我上周借你的那本书你读完了吗？

en: I've been meditating on what you said last week.
zh: 我一直在琢磨你上周说的那些话。

en: Didn't I give you 10,000 yen a week ago?
zh: 我一个礼拜前不是才给了你一万日元吗？

en: We gave a ball last week.
zh: 我们上周办了个舞会。

en: I read a few books last week.
zh: 我上礼拜看了几本书。

en: I read few books last week.
zh: 我上礼拜没读几本书。

en: My wife had a baby last week.
zh: 我老婆上周生了个孩子。

en: A terrible thing happened last week.
zh: 上周发生了一件挺可怕的事。

en: I saw Michel last week. He'd been sick for a week.
zh: 我上周见到米歇尔了，他那会儿已经病了一周了。

en: I've known it all along.
zh: 我早就知道了。

en: A man of vision will make good in the end.
zh: 有眼光的人最后总会出人头地的。

en: I had a bladder infection last month.
zh: 我上个月膀胱发炎了。

en: I wrote a letter to her last month, but I haven't received a reply yet.
zh: 我上个月给她写了封信，但到现在还没收到回信。

en: I forgot that I met her last month.
zh: 我忘了上个月见过她了。

en: Last month he had his house painted white.
zh: 他上个月把房子刷成了白色。

en: I heard from him last month.
zh: 我上个月收到他的消息了。

en: The boss caught me napping today when he asked me about that XYZ project we worked on last month.
zh: 今天老板问我上个月做的那个XYZ项目，我一下子被问懵了。

en: Last month they had a lot of rain in France.
zh: 法国上个月雨水很多。

en: Our grocery bill soared last month because of higher vegetable prices.
zh: 因为菜价涨了，我们上个月买菜的开支猛增。

en: We had uncertain weather last month.
zh: 上个月天气阴晴不定的。

en: It was very cold last month.
zh: 上个月冷得要命。

en: We had little rain last month.
zh: 上个月没怎么下雨。

en: It was a very busy month last month.
zh: 上个月特别忙。

en: We had a lot of rain last month.
zh: 上个月雨水特别多。

en: We didn't have much rain last month.
zh: 上个月雨下得不多。

en: The proportion of sunny days to rainy days last month was 4 to 1.
zh: 上个月晴天和雨天的比例是四比一。

en: The average temperature in Oxford last month was 18C.
zh: 牛津上个月的平均气温是18度。

en: There were 20 more births than deaths in the town last month.
zh: 上个月镇上的出生人数比死亡人数多了20个。

en: Last month, they had to lay off several hundred employees in the factory.
zh: 上个月，那家工厂裁了好几百名员工。

en: Last month our twenty-year-old daughter gave birth to a baby girl.
zh: 上个月我们20岁的女儿生了个女孩。

en: I haven't been feeling like myself since last month.
zh: 从上个月开始，我总觉得整个人不在状态。

en: I had the flu last month.
zh: 我上个月得了流感。

en: The goods ordered from England last month have not arrived yet.
zh: 上个月从英国订的货还没到。

en: I just started learning flower arrangement last month, so I'm still a beginner.
zh: 我上个月才开始学插花，还是个新手。

en: Three new stamps were issued last month.
zh: 上个月发行了三枚新邮票。

en: Last month my sister gave birth to a six-pound baby.
zh: 上个月我妹妹生了个六磅重的宝宝。

en: The pioneers have overcome a series of obstacles.
zh: 先驱们克服了重重障碍。

en: I had a difficult delivery last time.
zh: 我上次生孩子的时候难产。

en: Last time I couldn't carry my baby to full term.
zh: 我上次没能怀到足月。

en: Last time it was a natural childbirth.
zh: 我上次是顺产。

en: Last time I had a breech delivery.
zh: 我上次生的时候胎位不正。

en: I had an easy delivery last time.
zh: 我上次生得挺顺利的。

en: There was a mad rush toward the exit.
zh: 大家一股脑地往出口冲。

en: I was really nervous to see how they dealt with each other just now. I guess things were touch-and-go between them.
zh: 刚才看他们打交道我真挺紧张的，感觉情况挺悬的。

en: Listen to some more from the scene.
zh: 再多听听现场发回的消息。

en: There must have been an accident up ahead.
zh: 前面肯定出车祸了。

en: There must've been an accident up ahead.
zh: 前面准是出事故了。

en: You never can tell what'll happen in the future.
zh: 谁也说不准以后会发生什么。

en: You walk on and I'll catch up with you later.
zh: 你先走，我等会儿追你。

en: I don't mind if you go to bed before I get home.
zh: 要是我还没家你就想睡了，没关系，你先睡吧。

en: Do your homework first of all.
zh: 你先把作业写了。

en: Go ahead. I'll catch up with you in ten minutes.
zh: 你先走吧，我十分钟后追上你。

en: Go on ahead. I'll catch up with you soon.
zh: 你先走，我马上就追过去。

en: That's cheating to start running before everyone else.
zh: 还没发令就开始跑，那是耍赖。

en: Last I met him, he was very well.
zh: 上回见他的时候，他精神头挺好的。

en: The last time I saw him, he was very healthy.
zh: 我上次见他的时候，他身体还很硬朗。

en: We'll go to Hong Kong first, and then we'll go to Singapore.
zh: 我们先去香港，然后再去新加坡。

en: I'll turn off the fire first, and run to a safe place.
zh: 我会先关掉火，然后跑到安全的地方。

en: First, I'd turn off the fire and then I'd run to a safe place.
zh: 我会先关火，再往安全的地方跑。

en: The first thing to do is just to get a nice outfit for it.
zh: 首先得搞套像样的衣服。

en: We wanted to explain the recent service failure.
zh: 我们想说明一下最近服务中断的情况。

en: We recently discovered an error in your personnel record.
zh: 我们最近发现你的档案里有个错误。

en: The train bound for Sendai has just left.
zh: 去仙台的火车刚开走。

en: Change trains at Sendai Station for Tokyo.
zh: 在仙台站换乘去东京的火车。

en: In Sendai we have much rain in July.
zh: 仙台七月份雨水很多。

en: In Sendai, we have a lot of rain in July.
zh: 仙台七月份雨特别多。

en: In Sendai, we have lots of rain in July.
zh: 仙台七月份雨挺多的。

en: From Sendai I extended my journey to Aomori.
zh: 我从仙台又接着去了趟青森。

en: Let me see your tongue.
zh: 让我看看你的舌头。

en: Stick out your tongue.
zh: 伸出舌头。

en: Put out your tongue, please.
zh: 请伸一下舌头。

en: Please stick out your tongue.
zh: 请把舌头伸出来。

en: Please stick your tongue out.
zh: 请伸出舌头。

en: A tongue is the most venomous thing of all.
zh: 舌头是世界上最恶毒的东西。

en: No sooner is one lie out of your mouth than you're telling yet another.
zh: 你一个谎刚出口，紧接着又撒另一个。

en: Extinction is part of evolution.
zh: 灭绝是进化的一部分。

en: Extinction is a part of evolution.
zh: 灭绝是进化的一部分。

en: A fund was set up to preserve endangered marine life.
zh: 为了保护濒危海洋生物，人们设立了一项基金。

en: Don't give up your work in despair.
zh: 别因为绝望就放弃你的工作。

en: He rallied from despair.
zh: 他从绝望中振作了起来。

en: No way.
zh: 没门。

en: It's impossible.
zh: 这不可能。

en: I don't use taxis unless it's absolutely necessary.
zh: 除非万不得已，我一般不打车。

en: Unless it's absolutely necessary, I don't use taxis.
zh: 除非绝对有必要，否则我不打车。

en: There is no doubt.
zh: 毫无疑问。

en: You should have absolute rest.
zh: 你必须绝对静养。

en: I'm determined never to give way to temptation.
zh: 我决心绝不向诱惑低头。

en: I wouldn't take his job for the world.
zh: 无论如何我也不想干他的那份工作。

en: Never play on the road.
zh: 千万别在马路上玩。

en: It is essential that you should finish the work by this evening.
zh: 你今天晚上之前必须把这活儿干完。

en: Don't lose your cool.
zh: 别冲动。

en: I'm not absolutely sure.
zh: 我也不是百分之百确定。

en: Over my dead body.
zh: 除非我死。

en: I can't sell it for love or money.
zh: 给我多少钱我都不能卖。

en: It is forbidden for you to touch that switch.
zh: 严禁触碰那个开关。

en: I'm absolutely sure!
zh: 我绝对确定！

en: I'm absolutely sure.
zh: 我完全可以确定。

en: Absolutely not. It's too cold today.
zh: 绝对不行。今天太冷了。

en: There was nothing for it but to go without food.
zh: 没办法，只能饿肚子了。

en: The weather couldn't have been better.
zh: 天气好得不能再好了。

en: I missed a golden opportunity.
zh: 我错过了一个绝佳的机会。

en: The opportunity was grasped at immediately.
zh: 这个机会立刻就被抓住了。

en: It's now or never.
zh: 此时不干，更待何时。

en: It's going to take crackerjack timing, but if we can work the play, we'll win the game.
zh: 时机必须掐得非常准，但只要这招奏效，我们就赢了。

en: The continual noise deafened us.
zh: 持续不断的噪音震得我们耳朵都聋了。

en: A snowslide obstructed the road.
zh: 雪崩堵住了路。

en: If you whip the steering wheel around like that on a snowy road, the car is going to go into a slide.
zh: 在雪地上那样猛打方向盘，车会打滑的。

en: The abominable snowman is a Himalayan monster.
zh: 大雪怪是喜马拉雅山的一种怪物。

en: It's a snowy day.
zh: 今天是个下雪天。

en: We have to clear the snow from the roof.
zh: 我们得清一下屋顶上的积雪。

en: Snow reminds me of my hometown.
zh: 下雪总会让我想起老家。

en: We see a snow-capped mountain.
zh: 我们看到了一座山顶积雪的山。

en: By tomorrow, it will have been snowing for a week.
zh: 到明天，这雪就下了一整周了。

en: The snow was knee deep.
zh: 雪深得都过膝盖了。

en: Snow indicates the coming of winter.
zh: 下雪预示着冬天来了。

en: The snow has disappeared.
zh: 雪都化没了。

en: The snow keeps the young plants snug and warm.
zh: 雪能让幼苗觉得暖暖和和的。

en: It snowed from Monday to Friday.
zh: 从周一到周五一直在下雪。

en: The snow has melted away.
zh: 雪已经化光了。

en: The snow is melted.
zh: 雪化了。

en: Has the snow stopped yet?
zh: 雪停了吗？

en: The snow has disappeared in less than no time.
zh: 转眼间雪就全化了。

en: The snow will soon disappear.
zh: 雪很快就会化掉的。

en: Snow lay all over the ground.
zh: 地上到处都是雪。

en: Snow fell two meters deep.
zh: 雪下得有两米深。

en: It kept snowing all day.
zh: 雪下了一整天。

en: The snow melted away in a day.
zh: 雪一天就化完了。

en: The snow lasted four days.
zh: 雪连着下了四天。

en: It snowed for four days.
zh: 雪下了四天。

en: His steps were clearly marked in the snow.
zh: 雪地上清楚地留下了他的脚印。

en: I got lost in the snow.
zh: 我在雪里迷路了。

en: I waited for the bus in the snow as long as two hours.
zh: 我在雪里等公交等了足足两个小时。

en: Against the snow, the white rabbit was invisible.
zh: 在雪地里，根本看不出那只白兔子。

en: They live on the snow and ice of the Poles and in tropical jungles.
zh: 他们住在极地的冰天雪地里，也住在热带丛林里。

en: The house collapsed under the weight of snow.
zh: 房子被雪压塌了。

en: As the weather was snowy, we went skiing.
zh: 因为下雪了，我们就去滑雪了。

en: We get together in the hut and eat and drink.
zh: 我们聚在小屋里吃吃喝喝。

en: The trains weren't running due to the snowfall.
zh: 因为下雪，火车停运了。

en: The game was delayed on account of snow.
zh: 比赛因为下雪推迟了。

en: It is white as snow.
zh: 白得像雪一样。

en: The snow prevented the train from running.
zh: 大雪导致火车停运了。

en: Because of the snow, the train didn't run.
zh: 因为下雪，火车没开。

en: The snow prevented the airplane from taking off.
zh: 大雪让飞机没法起飞。

en: The snow prevented his going out.
zh: 雪大得他没法出门。

en: He couldn't go out because of the snow.
zh: 因为下雪，他没法出去。

en: The snow prevented me from going out.
zh: 雪大得我没法出门。

en: I couldn't go out because of the snow.
zh: 因为下雪，我出不去。

en: The school was closed due to the snow.
zh: 学校因为下雪停课了。

en: School was closed for the day due to the snow.
zh: 今天学校因为下雪放假了。

en: The snow prevented me from going there.
zh: 雪太大，我没去成那儿。

en: The snow prevented us from arriving on time.
zh: 雪让我们没法准时到。

en: Owing to the snow, the train was delayed.
zh: 因为下雪，火车晚点了。

en: The storm prevented me from attending the farewell party in honor of Mr Suzuki.
zh: 暴风雪害我没去成铃木先生的欢送会。

en: The snow compelled us to put off our departure.
zh: 大雪让我们不得不推迟出发。

en: The snow kept us from going out.
zh: 雪大得让我们出不了门。

en: The snow caused me to miss the train.
zh: 雪大得害我没赶上火车。

en: You must take your sweater in case it snows.
zh: 你得带上毛衣，万一下雪呢。

en: It is going to snow.
zh: 快要下雪了。

en: It looks like snow, doesn't it?
zh: 看着要下雪了，是吧？

en: It looks like snow.
zh: 看着像要下雪。

en: It looks like it's going to snow.
zh: 看来要下雪了。

en: Some snow-covered mountains were seen in the distance.
zh: 远处能看到几座积雪的山。

en: I hear it's buried under all that snow.
zh: 听说被埋在大雪下面了。

en: Look at the mountains covered with snow.
zh: 看那些被雪覆盖的山。

en: The mountain whose top is covered with snow is Mt. Fuji.
zh: 山顶积雪的那座山就是富士山。

en: Barring snow, father will come home.
zh: 只要不下雪，爸爸就会回家。

en: Who built the snowman?
zh: 雪人是谁堆的？

en: As long as it doesn't snow!
zh: 只要不下雪就好！

en: The snow banked up against the wall.
zh: 雪堆在了墙边。

en: The snow was brilliant in the morning sun.
zh: 晨光下的雪闪闪发亮。

en: Snow lies thick on the ground.
zh: 地上有厚厚的积雪。

en: It is false to say that snow is blue.
zh: 说雪是蓝色的，那是错的。

en: The snow lay deep.
zh: 雪积得很深。

en: It may snow.
zh: 可能会下雪。

en: It began to snow.
zh: 开始下雪了。

en: It's started to snow.
zh: 已经开始下雪了。

en: It started to snow.
zh: 下起雪来了。

en: It was beginning to snow.
zh: 刚才刚开始下雪。

en: Snow is falling thick and fast.
zh: 雪下得正猛呢。

en: Although it is snowing, I must go.
zh: 虽然在下雪，但我必须得走。

en: Though it was snowing, it wasn't very cold outside.
zh: 虽然在下雪，但外面倒不怎么冷。

en: It was snowing, but it wasn't very cold outside.
zh: 刚才在下雪，但外面不算太冷。

en: It has been snowing on and off.
zh: 雪一直在断断续续地下。

en: When the snow melts it flows into the river.
zh: 雪化了以后会流进河里。

en: The snow was melting and stuck to my skis.
zh: 雪在融化，粘在了我的滑雪板上。

en: It snowed for days on end.
zh: 雪连着下了好几天。

en: You can stay here till the snow stops.
zh: 你可以待在这儿等雪停。

en: Snow is falling.
zh: 正在下雪。

en: It is snowing.
zh: 下雪了。

en: It's snowing.
zh: 正下着雪呢。

en: The snow is falling fast.
zh: 雪下得很大。

en: Snow covered the bus.
zh: 雪覆盖了那辆巴士。

en: If it were not for the snow, we could climb the mountain.
zh: 要不是因为下雪，我们就能去爬山了。

en: Snow has begun to melt.
zh: 雪开始化了。

en: The snow has begun melting.
zh: 雪已经开始化了。

en: The snow has just come on.
zh: 雪刚开始下。

en: We have had a lot of snow and I am very happy.
zh: 下了好大的雪，我太开心了。

en: Much snow has fallen.
zh: 下了不少雪。

en: It snowed a lot.
zh: 下了一场大雪。

en: It was snowing thick and fast.
zh: 刚才雪下得特别大。

en: It snowed for ten consecutive days.
zh: 雪连着下了十天。

en: The snow lay one and a half meters deep.
zh: 积雪有一米半深。

en: You can't go wrong if you read the instructions carefully.
zh: 只要仔细看说明书，就不会出错。

en: I checked every part according to the instruction book, but it did not run.
zh: 我照着说明书检查了每个零件，但它还是运行不了。

en: There was no time left for explanation.
zh: 没时间解释了。

en: There was no time left for an explanation.
zh: 没时间多做解释了。

en: Would you like me to explain it?
zh: 需要我解释一下吗？

en: Please explain it.
zh: 请解释一下。

en: Could you elaborate?
zh: 能详细说一下吗？

en: We tried to persuade him.
zh: 我们劝过他了。

en: There is no reasoning.
zh: 没法讲理。

en: To preach is easier than to practice.
zh: 说起来容易做起来难。

en: Practice thrift!
zh: 要节约一点！

en: Temperance is the best physic.
zh: 节制是最好的良药。

en: A gang of thieves broke into the bank.
zh: 一伙小偷闯进了银行。

en: He was caught in the act of stealing.
zh: 他偷东西被当场抓住了。

en: The stated price does not include labor charges.
zh: 标价不含人工费。

en: I'm sorry that I wasn't home when you so kindly dropped by.
zh: 你好心来看我，我却不在家，真不好意思。

en: Her fingers were too weak to fold it.
zh: 她的手指没劲，折不动。

en: Better bend than break.
zh: 宁弯不折。

en: I'll tell him to call you back.
zh: 我会让他给你回电话的。

en: I'll call you back.
zh: 我会给你回电话的。

en: Please send the merchandise by return.
zh: 请立即寄回商品。

en: We look forward to receiving your quote by return mail.
zh: 期待您能立即回信报价。

en: Please reply by return.
zh: 请立即回复。

en: Please reply as soon as possible.
zh: 请尽快回复。

en: I want to ask you a big favor.
zh: 我想请你帮个大忙。

en: May I ask a very special favor of you?
zh: 能请你帮个特别的忙吗？

en: I'm all thumbs when it comes to origami, or paper folding.
zh: 我对折纸笨手笨脚的。

en: Please drop in at my house when you have a moment.
zh: 有空来我家坐坐。

en: The entertainment expense was borne by our group.
zh: 招待费由我们小组承担。

en: It looks like it's going to be anybody's race.
zh: 看来谁都有可能赢。

en: It was really close.
zh: 刚才真险。

en: Where's the ticket booth?
zh: 售票处在哪儿？

en: Where is the ticket office?
zh: 售票厅在哪儿？

en: You have to buy one at the office.
zh: 你得去办公室买一张。

en: I lost my ticket. What should I do?
zh: 我票丢了，怎么办？

en: Keep an eye on my suitcase while I get my ticket.
zh: 我去取票，帮我看着点箱子。

en: Keep an eye on my bag while I buy a ticket.
zh: 我去买票，帮 me 看着点包。

en: Keep an eye on my suitcase while I buy my ticket.
zh: 我去买票，帮我看着点箱子。

en: You'll have to wait not less than an hour to get a ticket.
zh: 买到票至少得等一个小时。

en: You'll have to wait at least an hour to get a ticket.
zh: 买票起码得等一个小时。

en: In order to buy a ticket, you'll have to wait at least an hour.
zh: 为了买票，你得等至少一个小时。

en: Ticket, please.
zh: 请出示票。

en: Let me check your ticket.
zh: 我查下你的票。

en: Let me see your ticket.
zh: 给我看下你的票。

en: When applying for tickets, please give alternative dates.
zh: 订票时，请提供备选日期。

en: You have only to push the button to get a ticket.
zh: 只要按一下按钮就能拿到票。

en: Get me a ticket, please.
zh: 请帮我买张票。

en: May I have a look at your ticket?
zh: 我能看下你的票吗？

en: Please show your ticket.
zh: 请出示您的票。

en: Please get me a ticket.
zh: 请帮我弄张票。

en: I think I've lost my ticket.
zh: 我觉得我票丢了。

en: The ticket will cost not less than 1,000 yen.
zh: 票价至少要一千日元。

en: The ticket is good for three days.
zh: 这张票三天内有效。

en: How long is the ticket good for?
zh: 这张票有效期是多久？

en: Where can I get a ticket?
zh: 在哪儿能买到票？

en: The tickets were sold out in a moment.
zh: 票一下子就卖光了。

en: All the tickets are sold out.
zh: 票全卖完了。
